title: FAKE Alert: Don’t believe this doctored video of ABP News anchor Rubika Liyaquat | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video has gone viral on social media in which ABP News anchor Rubika Liyaquat can be seen dancing and a disgraceful song can be heard in the background. After watching this, people are appealing to everyone to stop watching television.

ALSO READ: Don’t believe this morphed picture of PM Modi; here’s the truth

NewsMobile fact-checked the above video and found it to be doctored.

On scanning through Rubika’s social media handles, we found the original video on her verified Twitter handle which she had uploaded on November 07, 2018, during Diwali.

When one listens to the original video, we can make out that the song is different from the song, which has been inserted externally, using video editing software.

Meanwhile, retweeting the original video, Rubika warned the people who had morphed her video, with a strong message.

“All those who morphed my video get ready… UP Police will give you greetings of Diwali,” she wrote on Twitter.

Hence, the above information proves that the viral video is FAKE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
